qas.question: When did Univisión announce it was building a production studio in Miami?
What was the name of the production studio built in Miami by Univisión?
Where will the programs made at Univisión Studios be broadcast?

answers.text: all of Univisión Communications' television networks

qas.question: When did Univisión announce it wasn't building a production studio in Miami?
When did Fox announce it was building a production studio in Miami?
What was the name of the production studio built in Miami by Fox?
What wasn't the name of the production studio built in Miami by Univisión?

plausible_answers.text: all of Univisión Communications' television networks

qas.question: Where will the programs made at Univisión Studios not be broadcast?

context: Miami is also the headquarters and main production city of many of the world's largest television networks, record label companies, broadcasting companies and production facilities, such as Telemundo, TeleFutura, Galavisión, Mega TV, Univisión, Univision Communications, Inc., Universal Music Latin Entertainment, RCTV International and Sunbeam Television. In <a0_0><b3_0><b4_0>2009<b4_0/><b3_0/><a0_0/>, Univisión announced plans to build a new production studio in Miami, dubbed '<a1_0><b5_0><b6_0>Univisión Studios<b6_0/><b5_0/><a1_0/>'. Univisión Studios is currently headquartered in Miami, and will produce programming for <a2_0><b7_0>all of Univisión Communications' television networks<b7_0/><a2_0/>.
